# Labels (recommended)

Core routing:
- `agent:run` — triggers the agent runner workflow
- `agent:queued` — runner accepted and queued
- `agent:in-progress` — runner started work
- `agent:blocked` — missing info / needs human decision
- `needs:clarification` — issue needs more detail

Type:
- `type:bug`
- `type:feature`

Area:
- `area:backend`
- `area:frontend`
- `area:ci`

Priority:
- `priority:P0`
- `priority:P1`
- `priority:P2`
- `priority:P3`
